mapper.update: update department set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `location` = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `leading` = #{leading,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leading_id = #{leadingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT} where department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select department_id, `name`, `location`, `leading`, leading_id, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, enabled from department where department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select department_id, `name`, `location`, `leading`, leading_id, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, enabled from department
